efforts.name: Advanced Agent Development
efforts.description: Build sophisticated agents with advanced features and best practices

tasks.title: ⭐ Design agent architecture
tasks.description: Plan agent architecture for complex use cases. Consider modularity, reusability, scalability, and maintainability.

tasks.title: Create agent framework
tasks.description: Build a framework for developing agents. Standardize patterns, components, and development workflows.

tasks.title: Implement agent patterns
tasks.description: Create reusable patterns for common agent types. Document patterns, usage examples, and best practices.

tasks.title: Set up agent testing framework
tasks.description: Build comprehensive testing framework. Include unit, integration, and end-to-end tests for agents.

tasks.title: Design for extensibility
tasks.description: Build agents that are easy to extend and modify. Use plugins, hooks, and configuration for flexibility.

tasks.title: Create agent library
tasks.description: Build a library of reusable agent components. Share common functionality across multiple agents.

tasks.title: ⭐ Build multi-agent systems
tasks.description: Design systems with multiple agents working together. Handle coordination, communication, and shared state.

tasks.title: Implement error handling
tasks.description: Build robust error handling and recovery mechanisms. Handle edge cases gracefully with retries and fallbacks.

tasks.title: Add monitoring and observability
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive monitoring. Track performance, errors, usage, and business metrics.

tasks.title: Optimize agent performance
tasks.description: Profile and optimize agent performance. Improve efficiency, reduce costs, and improve response times.

tasks.title: Implement streaming responses
tasks.description: Add streaming for long-running agents. Provide incremental updates and improve perceived performance.

tasks.title: Add agent versioning
tasks.description: Implement versioning for agents. Manage updates, rollbacks, and A/B testing of agent versions.

projects.name: Production Deployment
projects.description: Deploy agents to production with proper processes

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up deployment pipeline
tasks.description: Create automated deployment pipeline. Include testing, staging, and production stages with proper gates.

tasks.title: Implement versioning strategy
tasks.description: Define versioning strategy for agents. Manage updates, rollbacks, and feature flags.

tasks.title: Configure production monitoring
tasks.description: Set up production monitoring and alerting. Track key metrics, errors, and performance issues.

tasks.title: Plan for maintenance
tasks.description: Establish maintenance procedures. Plan for updates, patches, and improvements with minimal downtime.

tasks.title: Create runbooks
tasks.description: Document operational procedures: deployments, rollbacks, troubleshooting, and incident response.

tasks.title: Set up canary deployments
tasks.description: Implement canary deployment strategy. Gradually roll out changes and monitor before full deployment.

efforts.name: Agent Orchestration
efforts.description: Build systems that coordinate multiple agents

tasks.title: ⭐ Design orchestration system
tasks.description: Plan system for coordinating multiple agents. Design workflows, state management, and communication patterns.

tasks.title: Implement workflow engine
tasks.description: Build workflow engine for multi-step processes. Handle sequencing, branching, and parallel execution.

tasks.title: Create agent registry
tasks.description: Build registry of available agents. Enable discovery, versioning, and metadata management.

tasks.title: Implement state management
tasks.description: Design state management for workflows. Store intermediate results and context across agent invocations.

tasks.title: Add workflow monitoring
tasks.description: Set up monitoring for workflows. Track progress, performance, and errors across agent chains.

tasks.title: Create workflow templates
tasks.description: Build reusable workflow templates. Enable rapid creation of common multi-agent workflows.

projects.name: Agent Communication
projects.description: Enable agents to communicate and share data

tasks.title: ⭐ Design communication patterns
tasks.description: Plan how agents communicate. Design message formats, protocols, and error handling for inter-agent communication.

tasks.title: Implement message queue
tasks.description: Set up message queue for agent communication. Handle async messaging, retries, and dead letter queues.

tasks.title: Create shared data store
tasks.description: Implement shared data store for agents. Enable data sharing while maintaining consistency and security.

tasks.title: Add event system
tasks.description: Implement event system for agent coordination. Enable pub/sub patterns and event-driven workflows.

tasks.title: Handle communication failures
tasks.description: Implement robust error handling for communication. Handle timeouts, failures, and retries gracefully.

tasks.title: Monitor agent interactions
tasks.description: Track agent interactions and communication patterns. Identify bottlenecks and optimization opportunities.

efforts.name: Agent Testing & Quality
efforts.description: Ensure agent quality through comprehensive testing

projects.name: Testing Strategy
projects.description: Develop comprehensive testing strategy for agents

tasks.title: ⭐ Define testing approach
tasks.description: Establish testing strategy covering unit, integration, and end-to-end tests. Define test coverage goals and quality gates.

tasks.title: Create test data sets
tasks.description: Build comprehensive test data sets. Include normal cases, edge cases, and error scenarios.

tasks.title: Implement test automation
tasks.description: Automate test execution. Run tests on every commit and before deployments.

tasks.title: Set up test environments
tasks.description: Configure test environments matching production. Use containers or infrastructure as code.

tasks.title: Create mock services
tasks.description: Build mocks for external services and APIs. Enable reliable testing without dependencies.

tasks.title: Implement performance testing
tasks.description: Test agent performance under load. Measure response times, throughput, and resource usage.

tasks.title: ⭐ Define quality criteria
tasks.description: Establish criteria for agent quality. Define what makes an agent 'production-ready' and how to measure it.

tasks.title: Implement code reviews
tasks.description: Set up code review process for agents. Ensure quality, consistency, and knowledge sharing.

tasks.title: Create quality checklists
tasks.description: Develop checklists for agent quality: error handling, logging, monitoring, documentation, and security.

tasks.title: Track quality metrics
tasks.description: Measure quality metrics: bug rates, test coverage, code review feedback. Track trends over time.

tasks.title: Conduct quality audits
tasks.description: Regularly audit agent quality. Review code, tests, documentation, and operational readiness.

tasks.title: Foster quality culture
tasks.description: Build culture that values quality. Recognize quality work and share best practices.
